title: Andrew Sheets: Let’s Say the Fed Cuts Rates in July…
description: Morgan Stanley's economics team now expects the Fed to cut interest rates by half a percent possibly as soon as July. On today’s podcast, Chief Cross-Asset Strategist Andrew Sheets examines how markets could react.
